interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Elli K Essential Sincerity From AZ Time Reverse Double Ampoule – Made in USA - Double Layering Serum – Repairing & Deep Hydrating – Oil and Cream Formula for Healthy and Smooth Skin, (2.02 fl.oz.) Review Date: 2022/07/30 Store: ELLI K Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Anti-aging', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Banana', 'Brand': 'ELLI K', 'Package Dimensions': '5.24 x 1.93 x 1.73 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '841960174819'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:a6ba862147ed74d78f8f3fda6a92fedd]] I must say that this double ampoule leaves my skin feeling very soft, moisturized and looking smooth and plumped.

It has quality ingredients and many that I have not used before and I was excited to try.

The scent is lovely and super faint.

I have been using this for a while now trying to see if I could justify the price, though my skin looks and feels very nice and I like this double ampoule and it’s quality ingredients, I have not seen enough difference between this any other quality ampoule I have used , I do know you are getting two ampoules and you are getting a total of 2 oz (1oz each) but I must say it is still a bit pricy but very nice. Review Title: My skin look and feels nice but.. Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream - Peppermint scent - 2oz Silver Miracles ['Colloidal Silver Foot Cream with Peppermint is a luxurious and moisturizing cream designed to hydrate and soothe the feet. Infused with colloidal silver and the refreshing scent of peppermint oil, this non-greasy formula quickly absorbs into the skin, leaving feet feeling soft and refreshed. The nourishing ingredients help to moisturize and protect the skin, while the peppermint aroma invigorates and soothes the senses. This foot cream is suitable for daily use and free of harsh chemicals or additives, making it a gentle and effective way to pamper your feet.'] {'Brand': 'Silver Miracles', 'Scent': 'Peppermint', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'Argentum Metallicum', 'Unit Count': '2.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '2.3 x 2.3 x 2.2 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '725022933210', 'Manufacturer': 'L&N Enterprises, LLC'} The foot cream is very moisturizing, rich and creamy.

I read the ingredients before I ordered and was maybe expecting a nice almond scent, since almond oil was one of the first ingredients but no it smells a bit more like minty something.

I do think the cream works very nice but the container is small and won’t last a real long time.

I ordered to use especially in the summer time when I am wearing sandals all the time and my feet get so dry . Creamy, rich, moist Laser Hair Removal Painless Device for Women and Men with FDA Cleared Upgraded to 999,999 Flashes Ice Cooling Permanent Reduction in Hair Regrowth at Home for Whole Body Armpits Legs Arms BESTEK ["Do you find it troublesome to use shaves shaving every day? Does the regrowth of body hair bother you? BESTEK IPL Electric Laser Hair Removal Machine is a personal home beauty treatment device, allowing you to have smooth and flawless skin like silk. Our products have expert-level high-safety FDA mark, which will avoid the pain of waxing and depilatory, and will not leave scars. It can be used on the face and body of men and women, such as chin, lips, beard, eyebrows or neck, pubic bone, hands, legs, bikini line, back area. Are you afraid of scars from burns? The best bestek epilator is produced with professional ice-cold technology, allowing you to enjoy a painless permanent hair removal salon, avoiding burn and sensitive redness. Smart IPL system can slow hair growth or even end, reduce skin wrinkles and aging, and achieve skin protection. Set the automatic mode to send out intense pulses with frequency. Manual mode can be used in a small area like a pen-shaped epilator. NOTE that the depilator can be used for adults with black or brown dark hair. If you hair dyed in red, blue and other colors, ironing or have acne, tattoos, moles, spots, please read the instructions before use. Kids should not use and it can’t be washed with water.Please use facial cleanser, makeup remover or soap to clean and dry the use area before use, and then trim the hair and shave with a trimmer or razors, no need to wax or apply cream, aloe vera gel, lotion, moisturizer, sunscreen. Wear your glasses and take care of your eyes when using it to prevent flash light. Bestek's portable mini hair removal tool can be taken to travel. The cool white body case and golden top can also be given to ladies as gifts. The accessories of kit includes a shaver and is delivered by Amazon. Buy Bestek new epilator and enjoy stress-free depilacion. Let your leg shine like stars at nigh this summer."] {'Product Dimensions': '7.48 x 2.4 x 1.18 inches; 1.39 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'BTJL068'} [[VIDEOID:8522f9386c54241244ac40c04f958706]] I finally am going to work towards getting rid of my unwanted hair, I have thought about it for years but the cost to get it done was too expensive and time consuming for me.

This is simple to operate, fast and I don’t find it painful , you can set it to the settings that is best for you.

I started on setting 2 and have slowed progressed to 3 , I use it twice a week, on my 7th week I will do only once a week (all layers out in the instructions).

This is a process that will vary from person to person depending on the settings and you pigmentation.

It does now work for people who are very blonde /or fair skinned , or dark skin or tattooed.

I have noticed after a few weeks my hair getting thinner already.

Even after you get rid of you hair you will still need to work to keep it that way for a while, there is a time line in how often to use it and how many weeks in the instructions.

I believe this is definitely the way to go if you are not interested in going to get this done at the much higher expense.

Be sure to wear the included eye protection 🕶 Very simple and fast Eyebrow Stencils & Eyebrow Pencil, 10 Styles of Eyebrow Shaper, Reusable Eyebrow Template with Dark Brown Dual-Ended Pencil & Eyebrow Razor, 3 Minutes Makeup, Suitable For All Face Shape VIAMAZ {'Brand': 'VIAMAZ', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Special Feature': 'Reusable', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable, Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.61 x 1.97 x 0.75 inches; 1.13 Ounces'} I ordered these because I have only half brows and meet to finish them by penciling them in, and this can be difficult to make both sides match up.

With this set you can pick the stencil that best matches your natural brows and then use the pencil to create brows. I didn’t use the whole stencil because most of them would create a pretty large brown but I use them to create the shape and make them both uniform. You pick a stencil then do one side then flip the stencil to do the other stencil.

Works pretty well but you will probably need to do some of your creativity to make them look more natural.

Over all these are pretty helpful especially when you have the need to draw on brows daily, it speeds of the process and makes sure your aren’t leaving the house with 2 totally different brows.🤨 Help create uniform left and right side brows Dry Weightless Hair Volume and Texture Spray | Dry Texture Spray for Hair | Texturizing Spray | Sulfate and Cruelty Free 244ml (7oz) Osensia {'Hair Type': 'All, Dry, Fine', 'Liquid Volume': '7 Fluid Ounces', 'Brand': 'Osensia', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '7.0 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '8.03 x 1.93 x 1.89 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '850001832274'} Perfect spray for a non wash day or even a wash day.

Spells really nice.

Gives my fine hair texture and fullness.

So good for people with oily hair.

I do not have oily, hair but I do have limp
Hair and I really like this spray it makes my clean hair seem like a second day hair.

Great product Live love this texture soray mold remover gel (3 Pack) Yondarli {'Brand': 'Yondarli', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '5.94 x 2.76 x 1.77 inches; 7.13 Ounces'} I had high hopes for this but I did use it for my washer because I already bought a new one.

I used this for both the grout in my bathroom and the moldy silicone around my bathroom tub faucet, I did not have great results on either, I tried several applications and same results.

I can’t say this would not work on your washer seal since I was not able to try it out on there. I used this t for grout and mold on silicone seal. Ultimate Essentials Kit {'Brand': 'Olaplex', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Benefits': 'Repairs, Strengthens & Protects hair. Restores texture. Adds shine.', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.38 x 4.88 inches; 7.83 Ounces', 'UPC': '850018802420', 'Manufacturer': 'Olaplex'} My daughter and I have been using ORAPLEX for years and swear by it.

Her hair is damaged from lighting it and mine is damaged from coloring it and age.

This is a perfect set if you would simply like to try it out or for travel.

You will not be sorry, it does wonders for your hair. This stuff is amazing, especially if you have dry damaged hair!!! Elli K Essential Sincerity From AZ Time Reverse Double Ampoule – Made in USA - Double Layering Serum – Repairing & Deep Hydrating – Oil and Cream Formula for Healthy and Smooth Skin, (2.02 fl.oz.) profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare and Haircare Focus:** The user continues to prioritize moisturizing and nourishing products. Their commitment to effective hair care is complemented by an expanding focus on facial skincare, particularly seeking hydrating and anti-aging solutions. Recent purchases reflect a balanced approach to both hair and skin health.

- **Scent Preference:**While retaining a strong preference for refreshing scents like peppermint, the user has shown positive reception toward subtle scents, as noted in their recent experience with a faint banana fragrance, indicating a slight openness to new scents outside their usual favorites.

- **Product Texture:** The user appreciates creamy and rich textures in skincare and is increasingly valuing products that enhance skin smoothness and hydration, suggesting a broader interest in products that deliver both tactile pleasure and efficacy.

- **Consumer Behavior:** Detail-oriented and ingredient-conscious, the user carefully reviews product compositions. They continue to favor larger container sizes for long-lasting value while maintaining high expectations for efficacy, as reflected in their ratings and recent experiences.

- **Seasonal Usage:** Their engagement with seasonal foot care products remains, but the recent hair and skincare purchases signify an adaptive routine suitable for year-round needs.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** The user typically rates products highly, reflecting a preference for effective and enjoyable items that offer visible results. They remain a conscientious individual seeking innovative skincare and haircare solutions to maintain a well-groomed appearance.
